Goblin009_25.speaker: Narrator
Goblin009_25.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

Goblin009_19.speaker: Narrator
Goblin009_19.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

Goblin009_9.speaker: Narrator
Goblin009_9.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

Goblin009_8.speaker: Player
Goblin009_8.text: The Absolute wants more - you should add your own blood to the offering.

Goblin009_11.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
Goblin009_11.text: Apologies, True Soul. I already lost a lot of blood durin' the fight - an' I still have to see the shrine finished.

Goblin009_26.speaker: Player
Goblin009_26.text: Put the bowl to your lips and drink every last drop.

Goblin009_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion step up to the shrine and drink the bowl of blood.

Goblin009_27.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
Goblin009_27.text: May the Absolute be with you forever, sir!
Goblin009_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is astonished for a moment, staring, then gets his act together.NodeContext: The goblin just saw the player drink a bowl with blood. He's looking up to him and is going to imitate him later. He thinks this is the correct way of honouring the Absolute.

Goblin009_13.speaker: Player
Goblin009_13.text: Offer a silent prayer to Shar.

Goblin009_20.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
Goblin009_20.text: You hear the Absolute's voice, don't you? I will soon - I can already feel Her coming closer!

Halsin_1.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_1.text: Enjoy yourself tonight. I'll come find you in the morning so we can talk.

Halsin_2.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_2.text: Enjoy yourself tonight. Come morning, we've got a hard road ahead of us.
Halsin_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Halsin already briefed the player on getting to Moonrise, so phrasing is differentNodeContext: Warm. 'Enjoy yourself while you can'

Halsin_3.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_3.text: Go on now, don't waste a night like this talking to me. We'll have plenty of time together on the way to Moonrise.
Halsin_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Halsin already briefed the player on getting to Moonrise, so phrasing is differentNodeContext: Warm. 'Go have fun while you have a chance'

Halsin_19.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_19.text: Go on now, don't waste a night like this talking to me. We'll discuss your problem tomorrow.

Halsin_16.speaker: Player
Halsin_16.text: I thought you might care to have a drink with me.

Halsin_24.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_24.text: In truth, I rarely imbibe. The stuff goes right to my head. Before you know it, I'd be breaking into song or declaring love to the first person I laid eyes on.

Halsin_17.speaker: Player
Halsin_17.text: I fail to see the problem.

Halsin_15.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_15.text: Then you have never heard me singing. Which makes you very fortunate.

Halsin_23.speaker: Player
Halsin_23.text: Perhaps there's something else you'd rather do then...

Halsin_7.speaker: Player
Halsin_7.text: There's other things we could do besides talking...

Halsin_28.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_28.text: I'm sure there are. You strike me as extremely... resourceful.
Halsin_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flirtily looks the player up and down right after 'extremely'NodeContext: trails off slightly after 'extremely' to flirtily look the player up and down.

Halsin_12.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_12.text: But there are many grateful people here who want to spend time with you. I must not keep you all to myself. As enjoyable as that may be.
Halsin_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Knowing smile on 'As enjoyable as that may be.'NodeContext: Knowing smile on 'As enjoyable as that may be.'

Halsin_8.speaker: Player
Halsin_8.text: But I'd like to get to know you some more now.

Halsin_4.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_4.text: We'll have time to spare for that, I sense. I'm surprised you haven't had your fill of me already.

Halsin_18.speaker: Player
Halsin_18.text: Hardly. I want to really get to know you.

Halsin_10.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_10.text: Ah, I see. Perhaps I can help you with that, another time.
Halsin_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cocked eyebrowNodeContext: Cocked eyebrow, playful. Picking up that the player is flirting with him

Halsin_0.speaker: Player
Halsin_0.text: Take your own advice, why don't you? Go on - mingle a little.

Halsin_26.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_26.text: Later, perhaps. Don't worry about me. A night under the stars amidst nature's creation is just what I need after being locked up in the goblins' dungeon.
Halsin_26.context: NodeContext: Reassuring. 'I'm fine; you go let your hair down'

Halsin_20.speaker: Halsin
Halsin_20.text: Go on, enjoy yourself. Seek out some wine before it runs dry - there are a lot of thirsty people around here.
